title: Three in a Bed: A Collection of Ménage à Trois Novellas
description: Three in a Bed offers a collection of ménage à trois novellas by best-selling erotic romance authors Trinity Blacio, Joy Daniels and Louisa Bacio.  In Hide and Seek a niece learns the real legacy inherited from her shocking aunt; in Poker Night we see how one couple was able to rekindle their heat when the lights go out with the wife’s old high school flame; and in Twister Howl we find out what really goes on at a naked twister howl.  You also won’t want to miss the bonus chapter by Ms. Blacio that takes us behind the scenes at the werewolf games.
author: Joy Daniels
